entry.title: WIND WARNING , Cap Chat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 5:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: ENE 41 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain near midnight. Snowfall amount 10 cm over eastern sections. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 70 gusting to 100 this evening then south 50 gusting to 70 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
